articles.author: Chelsey Cox
articles.title: Treasury chief Yellen touts GDP numbers as a boon to the middle class - CNBC
articles.description: Yellen said the U.S. has "avoided financial pain for most middle-class American families" due to a strong post-pandemic recovery.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen praised the positive economic growth numbers on Thursday as a benefit for the middle class.
"Though some forecasters thought a recession last year was inev… [+1760 chars]
